name: wackiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being unusual in a pleasing and exciting or silly way: The band's wackiness delighted the crowd. The song is way too full of its own wackiness and is quite intensely annoying. See
wacky
More examplesFewer examplesThis should give you some idea of the wackiness of the whole concept.After about ten minutes his studied wackiness began to grate.A bit of bad taste and a touch of wackiness can be fun.
